verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus Christ, I think upon Your sacrifice You became nothing, poured out to death Many times I’ve wondered at Your gift of life And I’m in that place once again I’m in that place once again{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And once again I look upon the cross where You died I’m humbled by Your mercy and I’m broken inside Once again I thank You Once again I pour out my life{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now You are exalted to the highest place King of the heavens, where one day I’ll bow But for now, I marvel at Your saving grace And I’m full of praise once again I’m full of praise once again{/lang-eng}
